title: senior moderator and administrator
extract: Very often, managing a Facebook Group is a team work. There are 2 different roles: admin and moderator. The admin is the top manager and manages all the group settings. The moderator is in charge of the daily operation.Jun 6, 2016
extract_html: Very often, managing a Facebook Group is a team work. There are 2 different roles: admin and moderator. The admin is the top manager and manages all the group settings. The moderator is in charge of the daily operation.Jun 6, 2016
